title: AssetDump v2 Types Dictionary
description: Mapping between classKey and Unity ClassID/ClassName pairs shared across assets. From IUnityObjectBase.ClassID/ClassName and SerializedType metadata.

domain.description: Fixed domain identifier for types table

classKey.description: Stable integer identifier assigned by the exporter, used to reference types from assets.classKey

classId.description: Unity ClassID (114 = MonoBehaviour, etc.), from IUnityObjectBase.ClassID or ObjectInfo.ClassID

typeId.description: Type ID of the object (from ObjectInfo.TypeID). For non-MonoBehaviour types, equals classId. For MonoBehaviour (ClassID 114), this is the script's unique identifier.

serializedTypeIndex.description: Index in the SerializedFile.Types array (Unity 5+, from ObjectInfo.SerializedTypeIndex). -1 if not applicable or Unity 4 or earlier.

scriptTypeIndex.description: Script type index for MonoBehaviour types (from SerializedType.ScriptTypeIndex or ObjectInfo.ScriptTypeIndex). -1 if not a MonoBehaviour.

isStripped.description: Whether the type definition was stripped from the build (from SerializedType.IsStrippedType or ObjectInfo.Stripped)

originalClassName.description: Original Unity type name before any processing or renaming by AssetRipper (from UniversalClass.OriginalName)

baseClassName.description: Name of the base class if it exists (from UniversalClass.Base?.Name)

isAbstract.description: Whether the class is abstract (from UniversalClass.IsAbstract)

isEditorOnly.description: Whether the class only appears in editor builds (from UniversalClass.EditorRootNode != null && UniversalClass.ReleaseRootNode == null)

isReleaseOnly.description: Whether the class only appears in game builds (from UniversalClass.ReleaseRootNode != null && UniversalClass.EditorRootNode == null)

monoScript.description: MonoScript information for MonoBehaviour types (ClassID 114). Retrieved from the associated MonoScript asset.

assemblyName.description: Assembly name containing the script (from MonoScript.AssemblyName)

namespace.description: Namespace of the script class (from MonoScript.Namespace)

className.description: Class name of the script (from MonoScript.ClassName)

scriptGuid.description: GUID of the MonoScript asset (from MonoScript GUID)

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about this type
